definition.name: Sheet
definition.purpose: Provides a root container for a sheet (side panel) dialog UI component.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's Dialog Root, used as the main entry point for the sheet component. It manages the open/close state and context for all nested sheet elements.

properties.description: All props supported by Radix Dialog Root.

initial.data: Sheet is closed by default unless controlled via props.

when.description: User or program opens the sheet via trigger or controlled prop.

visible: Sheet overlay and content are visible

effects: Sheet context is provided to children

when.description: User or program closes the sheet via close button, overlay click, or controlled prop.

visible: Sheet overlay and content are visible

effects: Sheet context is removed from children

definition.visualLayout: Sheet is rendered as a modal overlay with a sliding panel from a specified side.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix Dialog Root for accessibility and state management.

definition.name: SheetTrigger
definition.purpose: Provides a trigger element to open the sheet dialog.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's Dialog Trigger, used to open the sheet when interacted with (e.g., button click).

properties.description: All props supported by Radix Dialog Trigger.

initial.data: Trigger is rendered and sheet is closed.

visible: Sheet overlay and content are visible

definition.visualLayout: Trigger can be any element (e.g., button) that opens the sheet.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix Dialog Trigger for accessibility.

definition.name: SheetClose
definition.purpose: Provides a button or element to close the sheet dialog.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's Dialog Close, used to close the sheet when interacted with (e.g., button click).

properties.description: All props supported by Radix Dialog Close.

initial.data: Sheet is open and close button is visible.

visible: Sheet overlay and content are visible

definition.visualLayout: Close button is typically rendered in the sheet content area.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix Dialog Close for accessibility.

definition.name: SheetPortal
definition.purpose: Renders the sheet dialog in a React portal.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's Dialog Portal, used to render the sheet outside the normal DOM hierarchy for accessibility and overlay purposes.

properties.description: All props supported by Radix Dialog Portal.

initial.data: Sheet is rendered in a portal when open.

visible: Sheet overlay and content in portal
Sheet overlay and content in portal

effects: Sheet is rendered in a React portal

definition.visualLayout: Sheet is rendered at the end of the DOM tree via a portal.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix Dialog Portal for accessibility.

definition.name: SheetOverlay
definition.purpose: Renders the overlay (backdrop) for the sheet dialog.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's Dialog Overlay, styled with custom classes and transitions. It dims the background and handles click-to-close behavior.

properties.description: All props supported by Radix Dialog Overlay, plus className.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the overlay.

initial.data: Overlay is hidden when sheet is closed, visible when open.

visible: Overlay covers the viewport when sheet is open
enabled: Overlay can be clicked to close the sheet

definition.visualLayout: Overlay is a fixed, semi-transparent black background covering the viewport.
definition.implementationNotes: Styled with utility classes and uses cn for merging class names.

definition.name: SheetContent
definition.purpose: Renders the main content area of the sheet dialog, sliding in from a specified side.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's Dialog Content, styled and animated to slide in from the right, left, top, or bottom. Includes a close button and supports custom children.

properties.description: All props supported by Radix Dialog Content, plus className, children, and side.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the content.

children.description: Content to display inside the sheet.

side.description: The side from which the sheet appears.

initial.data: Sheet content is hidden when closed, visible when open.

visible: Sheet content panel with children and close button
Content panel slides in from specified side

when.description: User clicks the close button in the content panel.

definition.visualLayout: Content panel slides in from the specified side and contains children and a close button in the top-right corner.
definition.implementationNotes: Combines SheetPortal, SheetOverlay, and Radix Dialog Content. Uses cn for class merging and supports four slide directions. Includes a styled close button with an icon.

definition.name: SheetHeader
definition.purpose: Renders a header section for the sheet dialog content.
definition.description: A styled div for placing header content (e.g., title, actions) at the top of the sheet.

properties.description: All props supported by div, plus className.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the header.

initial.data: Header is rendered at the top of the sheet content.

from.state: Sheet closed or header not rendered

visible: Header section at top of content

definition.visualLayout: Header is a flex column with padding at the top of the sheet content.
definition.implementationNotes: Styled with utility classes and uses cn for merging class names.

definition.name: SheetFooter
definition.purpose: Renders a footer section for the sheet dialog content.
definition.description: A styled div for placing footer content (e.g., actions) at the bottom of the sheet.

properties.description: All props supported by div, plus className.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the footer.

initial.data: Footer is rendered at the bottom of the sheet content.

from.state: Sheet closed or footer not rendered

visible: Footer section at bottom of content

definition.visualLayout: Footer is a flex column with margin-top auto and padding at the bottom of the sheet content.
definition.implementationNotes: Styled with utility classes and uses cn for merging class names.

definition.name: SheetTitle
definition.purpose: Renders a title for the sheet dialog.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's Dialog Title, styled for prominence in the sheet header.

properties.description: All props supported by Radix Dialog Title, plus className.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the title.

initial.data: Title is rendered in the sheet header.

when.description: Sheet header is rendered with title.

from.state: Sheet closed or title not rendered

definition.visualLayout: Title is styled as a bold, prominent text in the header.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix Dialog Title and cn for class merging.

definition.name: SheetDescription
definition.purpose: Renders a description for the sheet dialog.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's Dialog Description, styled for secondary text in the sheet header or content.

properties.description: All props supported by Radix Dialog Description, plus className.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the description.

initial.data: Description is rendered in the sheet header or content.

when.description: Sheet header or content is rendered with description.

from.state: Sheet closed or description not rendered

definition.visualLayout: Description is styled as muted, smaller text below the title or in the content.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix Dialog Description and cn for class merging.
